0.1.name: wordpress/glossarey
0.1.description: Glossarey is a custom dictionary plugin for your wordpress site. It's functionality is very basic - you create a list of your terms through admin Glossary post type, then when creating post you can use the shortcode generator button built in the WP Editor. Plugin will generate a link, which will display a tooltip on mousover action while hovering the link.
